page.title: 09Rugby League in St.Helens
page.content: The St.Helens Rugby League Football Club,which was founded in 1890,play at Knowsley Road.The ground was built in the 1930's.Although it has a ground capacity of 32,000 only 7,000 people on average attended last season.There is little vandalism at the ground and there have been no major disasters. The club's strip is white shirts with a red 'V',red sleeves and white shorts.As the team is sponsered,the name of the firm appears on the shirt. The team have been very successful in the past and in 1985 won the Lancashire Cup and the Premiership Trophy. The team plays about 40 matches a season and trains three times a week at a local sports centre.At the ground they have their own weight training facilities to develop strength.
